thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 7 of 171
thread.title: Russell Mason

author: Russell Mason
title: Russell Mason
text:
As first time users of this service we were not sure what to expect however now that we have used it, I would not hesitate in recommending it to others. Great experience and great system.
If you are going away and don't like leaving your pets with someone else and your house empty then this is a fantastic alternative.
Well setup, well organised and simple to use. Thx R
